titles.title: FHA Downpayment Simplification Extension Act of 2000
FHA Downpayment Simplification Extension Act of 2000
FHA Downpayment Simplification Extension Act of 2000
To amend the National Housing Act to temporarily extend the applicability of the downpayment simplification provisions for the FHA single family housing mortgage insurance program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Mr. Leach moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5193.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 9/19/2000--Passed House amended. FHA Downpayment Simplification Extension Act of 2000 - Amends the National Housing Act to extend certain downpayment provisions of the Federal Housing Administration single family housing mortgage insurance program to include mortgages closed on or before October 30, 2000.
